name: Lotus Eaters: Violet Demo
description:
Step into the shoes of a university student named  Violet, as she witnesses the horrifying sight of an otherworldly specter devouring her professor, leaving neither  trace nor memory of him behind.   Except for Violet's memory, of course.

Join Violet as she attempts to uncover the truth behind this mysterious disappearance, all the while trying to discern reality from fiction  as the world twists and turns around her.  It is up to you to ensure    she does not succumb to a terrible fate ... Will you uncover what lies beyond the Veil?

Discord Server:   https://discord.gg/d9SjHv48kj  (Share your feedback or just chat!)

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LE_V_Official   (Follow for news and updates!)

Official site: https://lotuseatersstudio.com/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9hiLpoMPMRDEzHOPKLX70Q
